mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (iuser, address, address_detail, total_price, shipping_price, shipping_memo) VALUES (#{iuser}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{totalPrice}, #{shippingPrice}, #{shippingMemo})

INSERT INTO `order_item` (iorder, iitem, price, quantity, total_price) VALUES
((SELECT iorder FROM `order` order BY iorder DESC LIMIT 0,1), #{item.iitem}, (SELECT price FROM item WHERE iitem=#{item.iitem}), #{item.quantity}, #{item.totalPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT address, address_detail addressDetail, shipping_memo shippingMemo, total_price totalPrice FROM `order` WHERE iorder = #{iorder} AND del_yn = 1
SELECT iorder FROM `order` WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND del_yn = 1

SELECT B.iitem, B.`name`, A.price, A.total_price totalPrice, B.pic, C.created_at paymentDate FROM order_item A INNER JOIN item B ON A.iitem = B.iitem INNER JOIN `order` C ON A.iorder = C.iorder WHERE C.iorder = #{iorder} AND A.del_yn = 1

select.foreach: SELECT A.iitem, B.name, B.price, A.quantity, B.pic FROM cart A INNER JOIN item B ON A.iitem = B.iitem WHERE A.icart = #{item}

mapper.select: SELECT A.iitem, C.name, A.price, A.quantity, A.total_price totalPrice, C.pic, B.created_at paymentDate, B.address, B.address_detail addressDetail, B.shipping_price shippingPrice, B.shipping_memo shippingMemo FROM order_item A INNER JOIN `order` B ON A.iorder = B.iorder INNER JOIN item C ON A.iitem = C.iitem WHERE B.iorder = #{iorder} AND A.iitem = #{iitem}
SELECT user_address userAddress, user_address_detail userAddressDetail, name, phone FROM user WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND del_yn = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE order SET iorder = #{iorder} AND del_yn = 0
